channel.title: Why can id Software let go of there ego?
channel.description:
ok so i have been thinking this ever since wolfenstein 2009 came out, why couldnt id software just exept that wolfenstein was over? Like duke nukem did, i have to admit return to castle wolenstein was a great game, and it was cool, but it was cool in the 90's!! id was a great game company back in the late 80's through the 90's, but they just have to admit that there time is over and go away
dont get me wrong, i like wolfenstein, and espically doom, but thoughs games were big in the 90's, lets keep it that way

item.title: Why can id Software let go of there ego?
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
The following comment may destroy my reputation on this site.

I fucking loved the new Wolfenstein. The game was creative in it’s use of genre cliches in an interesting manner- the game mechanics continually evolved as I played and the ways you can trick out the guns are consistently fun. Raven did a good job on this one, it saddens me to see the 7s in the review scores when this game deserves at least an 8.2. The story wasn’t much to write home about but the important thing was that the game is fun. And when it comes to games, that’s what counts, isn’t it?

Read full topic
item.source: Why can id Software let go of there ego?

item.title: Why can id Software let go of there ego?

iD started it all with Doom then it all went downhill with Doom 3. Rage may be good, who knows.

And Duke Nukem is fucking stupid.

item.title: Why can id Software let go of there ego?
item.dc:creator: TheeGoatPig
item.description:
SwampFox56:

i do agree that thoughs other devoloupers do have a way to big ego, but the difference between them and id is that there the new guys, id is the grampa of game develoupers, i think that they should have died away already, they kinda did from 1999-2009 but then they realesed wolfenstein 2009, and its just like OMG!!! there still here

at least sierra had the good sense to go away when vinvedi swallowed them but id just wont go away.

again dont get me wrong i love id but there history they need to go away

id made Doom 3 between those years, and didn’t release either Wolfenstein game. They contracted those out to Gray Matter and Raven.

Read full topic

item.title: Why can id Software let go of there ego?
item.dc:creator: SwampFox56
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

iD is a great company with hilarious antics and fun games. The company’s collective ego has little effect on the way I view their products.

Like i said i love id but they still think that there all that when there not

Rossman:

Actually I think ID has been doing pretty good. I mean they’re putting out new ideas and comming out with some pretty fresh looking titles such as Rage. Plus their new engine looks like it can kick the shit out of older tiltled engines.

yes i do agree with this but but, the source engine is still alot better

Read full topic

item.title: Why can id Software let go of there ego?
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
TheeGoatPig:

id didn’t make the last Wolfenstein game. They sourced it out to (another company).

^This
Raven made the previous Wolfenstein, and Grey Matter Interactive made Return to Castle Wolfenstein. The latter of which id oversaw development of.

I have to say I’m excited to see what Rage will be like

Read full topic
